entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is planning a celebration in the common room.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's godfather who left him a knife that he is carrying with him.

relationships.description: Harry met Seamus in the corridor, two floors up from where Harry was trying to escape.
Harry also met Dean in the corridor, two floors up from where Harry was trying to escape.
Harry joined Ron and his other friends at the end of Umbridge's corridor.
Harry was with Hermione, along with their other friends, at the end of Umbridge's corridor.
Harry was also with Ginny, along with their other friends, at the end of Umbridge's corridor.
Harry was with Luna, along with their other friends, at the end of Umbridge's corridor.
